title: The Evolution of Photocatalytic H2O2 Generation: From Pure Water to Natural Systems and Beyond

Photocatalytic hydrogen peroxide (PHP) production represents a sustainable approach that mimics photosynthesis using sunlight to generate H2O2 from water and oxygen. This review explores the intricate mechanisms of PHP and...
